page.title: 19CHANGES IN CHURCH STRETTON
page.content: Some children in our class talked to one of our dinner ladies who has lived in{Church Stretton}all her life. She told us about how it}has changed over the last{50{years. It has grown a lot. There are now a lot more houses and people and there are now two schools. There used to be one main school but there were a few private schools as well. There used to be a{cinema}but now it is a shop called Spar. There were not any houses in{ Lutwyche Road, Central Avenue and Brooksbury but there are now. The Fire Station used to be at{ Beaumont Court but now it is in { Sandford Avenue. There only used to be a few cars but now there are a lot.
